Posts.Content: Ive got a pic line in and i didnt feel a thing,i even watched on the monitor,i find it much easier than the last time when i was on tablets that had to be timed,i have my chemo once a fortnight and a pump on for 3 days then nothing for 2 more weeks,please dont worry it wont hurt and much more convenient,the nurse comes once a week to clean it,and that it ,good luck and be strong xx Janice
Posts.Title: Picc line/bad veins
